trends: There have been no other sightings in Inyokern
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsinyokern,ca october 5th 2012 at a little after 8pm. there was a ufo flying over. it went from a 50 cent sized disc & got closer getting much bigger. a very clear night, nothing going on. the lights were white & blue & went around the object on its sides\diameter. it was very quiet, no noise at all. this isnt the first time we have seen alot of weird movement in this area. and its home to a naval air weapons base too.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
